module.name: SegmenterContour
module.description: Segments a binary image and outputs a stream of objects (with OpenCV contour) and extracts their features (position, width and height)

param.name: class
param.description: Class of the module (define the module's function)

param.name: auto_process
param.description: If yes the module processes with a timer at fixed fps, if no the module processes based on the time stamp of the input stream

param.name: min_width
param.description: Minimal width of an object to segment.

param.name: min_height
param.description: Minimal height of an object to segment.

param.name: object_label
param.description: Label to be applied to the objects detected by the cascade filter (e.g. face)

param.name: features
param.description: List of features to extract, separated with ',' possible: x,y,width,height,ellipse_{angle,ratio,width,height}
